title: Designing Technology-Enhanced Science Learning Environments: Cognitive Theory Application Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and basic understanding of digital device usage
context.additional_context: Learners possess advanced expertise in science and aim to gain practical understanding of technology-based learning environment design, with project-based assessments evaluating real-world application skills.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three cognitive theory-based instructional design principles to online science education
Learners can design large-scale participatory science experiment simulations using digital tools
Learners can write reports analyzing the educational effectiveness of technology environments through project-based assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
